issue.title: [CF 157] ICD tracking StartTime nil value
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
I'm using a meta icon to show a) Nature's Grace duration, b) Nature's Grace ICD remaining while under 45s.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I get an error when the ICD hits 45s and should show on the meta icon.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.0.1.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Date: 2011-04-11 08:31:28
ID: 1
Error occured in: Global
Count: 8
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Types\icd.lua line 108:
   attempt to perform arithmetic on field 'StartTime' (a nil value)
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\Types\icd.lua:108: OnUpdate()
   TellMeWhen\Types\meta.lua:43: OnUpdate()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:714:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:705

Please provide any additional information below.
This error doesn't appear with TellMeWhen 4.0.1.2


> Posted by CurseForge user kaustos | Imported from CurseForge issue #157 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua

<p>Nature's Grace tracker with error (on character Clubsteak)</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user kaustos

Yikes! Sorry! Fix is up.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
